title: Andhra Pradesh Silk Farmers Struggle
description: Chebrolu, a major mulberry cultivation area in Andhra Pradesh, faces a sericulture crisis.  A disease crippling silkworms, coupled with limited market access and government aid, has pushed many farmers to abandon silk production for cotton and oil palm.  This devastating combination threatens Chebrolu's dream of becoming the state's Silk City.  The documentary explores the challenges faced by these farmers and their struggle for survival in the face of adversity.  Discover their resilience and the fight to preserve a vital part of Andhra's heritage.  Learn about the economic hardships and the potential loss of a traditional craft.
